title: Commerce and trade; annual reports of the value of securities sold or offered to be sold; provide

abstracts.abstract: A BILL to be entitled an Act to amend Title 10, Title 14, and Title 48 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated, relating to commerce and trade, corporations, partnerships, and associations, and revenue and taxation, respectively, so as to provide for annual reports of the value of securities sold or offered to be sold; to provide for fees; to provide for the joint and several liability of controlling private funds for the liabilities of target firms acquired by such controlling private funds; to eliminate a certain income tax deduction; to provide for taxation of capital gains on sales of property in qualified opportunity zones; to provide for sales tax for computer software; to provide for definitions; to provide for an effective date and applicability; to provide for related matters; to repeal conflicting laws; and for other purposes.
